content:

basicQuest.title: Pat a Pet
basicQuest.instructions:
A simple pat can mean the world to a furry friend. Whether itâ€™s a wagging tail, a purring cat, or even a curious bird â€” touch is connection.

Take a moment to slow down, offer affection, and feel the heartbeat of another life. They don't ask for much â€” just love in return.

AiSnap.taskDescription: a person patting a pet like a cat or dog
